titles.title: Supporting the designation of the week of September 14 through September 20, 2025, as "National Truck Driver Appreciation Week".
Supporting the designation of the week of September 14 through September 20, 2025, as "National Truck Driver Appreciation Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National Truck Driver Appreciation Week.
